name: @saekitominaga/isbn-verify
description: Verify ISBN string format and check digit.

scripts._ts-watch:compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/ISBN.esm.js -- brotlin compress dist/ISBN.esm.js -m 1
scripts._ts-watch:minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/ISBN.esm.js -- terser dist/ISBN.esm.js -o dist/ISBN.min.esm.js -c ecma=2020 --mangle --ecma 2020 --module --source-map base=dist,filename=ISBN.esm.js,includeSources
scripts._ts-watch:compress-minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/ISBN.min.esm.js -- brotlin compress dist/ISBN.min.esm.js -m 1
scripts._ts-watch:dts-minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/ISBN.esm.d.ts -- cpy dist/ISBN.esm.d.ts dist --rename=ISBN.min.esm.d.ts

author: Saeki Tominaga
